value.latex:
Soient $A,B \in { K[X]}$, $p = \deg A$, $q = \deg B$.
On consid{\`e}re l'application :
    $${\Phi} : {{ K_{q-1}[X]} \times { K_{p-1}[X]}} \to 
                          { K_{p+q-1}[X]},  {(U,V)}  \mapsto {UA + VB}$$


D{\'e}montrer que : $A \wedge B = 1 \iff \Phi$ est bijective.
value.html:
Soient \(A,B \in { K[X]}\), \(p = \deg A\), \(q = \deg B\). On considère l’application : \[{\Phi} : {{ K_{q-1}[X]} \times { K_{p-1}[X]}} \to { K_{p+q-1}[X]}, {(U,V)} \mapsto {UA + VB}\]

Démontrer que : \(A \wedge B = 1 \iff \Phi\) est bijective.
